duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the entire project lifecycle, including initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, and closeout, ensuring compliance with HSE guidelines.
Collaborate with commercial operations team to confirm customer and order information, review order handoffs, and manage order documentation.
Facilitate communication between commercial operations team and field/production operations to support Accounts Receivable reduction.
Maintain and reduce overdue payments, plan costs, and manage order margins, reporting any deviations and sharing lessons learned.
Provide administration assistance and support in project orders and turnkey projects, and communicate directly with customers for project updates, scheduling, and closeout documentation.

Manage commercial relations, communicate shipping and tracking information, verify necessary project and order documentation, confirm scope of supply, initiate invoicing, and manage Accounts Receivable process.
Send and follow-up customer satisfaction surveys related to the responsible orders.
Live Hitachi Energy’s core values of safety and integrity, taking responsibility for actions while caring for colleagues and the business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
